RelatedSentence: Kentucky State Police , Post 10 Harlan arrested four individuals accused of holding a 12 - year - old boy against his will .
According to a press release , on May 15 at 10 p.m. , KSP received a call that a 12 - year - old boy had been tied up and held against his will at a neighbor 's residence .
Troopers Russell Maynard and Desmond Brittle responded to South Point Drive in Barbourville .
The citation states preliminary investigation indicates the juvenile was at a nearby residence .
The juvenile received minor injuries that did not require medical treatment , police said .
